This endpoint is used to initiate a workflow request to create a new fee. If accepted, the response will include a Location header that can be used to poll the status of the workflow request.

See the "Get workflow status for a newly created fee" endpoint documentation for details on interpreting the workflow status.

amount.description: fee amount. When calculation is PERCENTAGE_OF_BASE or PERCENTAGE_OF_SUBTOTAL, 0.12 would equal a 12% fee

unitId.description: The unit id this fee should apply to

link.description: A link to the details for the fee

message.description: Informational text in relation to status

feeId.description: The newly created fee id (when status is SUCCESS)

url.description: The relative url for getting the newly created fee (when status is SUCCESS)

stayRangePolicy.description:
Which days of a stay can be discounted if the stay falls partially outside of stayRange
      WHOLE_STAY - the whole stay is discounted, even if part falls outside of the stayRange
      INCLUDED_DAYS - only days inside the stayRange are discounted

blackoutPolicy.description:
Which days of a stay can be discounted if the stay falls partially over blackoutRanges
      WHOLE_STAY - the whole stay is discounted, even if part falls inside a blackoutRange
      INCLUDED_DAYS - only days outside of any blackoutRange are discounted

calculated.description: The type of calculation to be used on the promotion

unitId.description: The unit id this promotion should apply to

ratePlanId.description: if present, promotion only applies for this unit when using the specified rate plan

isActive.description: Allows setup of promotions without allowing them to be booked

stayRangePolicy.description:
Specifies how the stayRange is applied:
    COMPLETE - entire stay must be within stayRange
    PARTIAL - any part of the stay must be within stayRange
    CHECK_IN - check-in date must be in stayRange

blackoutPolicy.description:
Specifies how blackoutRanges are applied:
    COMPLETE - entire stay must not fall in a blackoutRange
    PARTIAL - any part of the stay must not fall in a blackoutRange
    CHECK_IN - check-in date must not fall in a blackoutRange

message.description: Informational text in relation to status

promotionId.description: The newly created promotion id (when status is SUCCESS)

url.description: The relative url for getting the newly created promotion (when status is SUCCESS)

isActive.description: Allows setup of promotions without allowing them to be booked

stayRangePolicy.description:
Specifies how the stayRange is applied:
    COMPLETE - entire stay must be within stayRange
    PARTIAL - any part of the stay must be within stayRange
    CHECK_IN - check-in date must be in stayRange

blackoutPolicy.description:
Specifies how blackoutRanges are applied:
    COMPLETE - entire stay must not fall in a blackoutRange
    PARTIAL - any part of the stay must not fall in a blackoutRange
    CHECK_IN - check-in date must not fall in a blackoutRange

stayRangePolicy.description:
Which days of a stay can be discounted if the stay falls partially outside of stayRange
      WHOLE_STAY - the whole stay is discounted, even if part falls outside of the stayRange
      INCLUDED_DAYS - only days inside the stayRange are discounted

blackoutPolicy.description:
Which days of a stay can be discounted if the stay falls partially over blackoutRanges
      WHOLE_STAY - the whole stay is discounted, even if part falls inside a blackoutRange
      INCLUDED_DAYS - only days outside of any blackoutRange are discounted

calculated.description: The type of calculation to be used on the promotion

isActive.description: Allows setup of promotions without allowing them to be booked

stayRangePolicy.description:
Specifies how the stayRange is applied:
    COMPLETE - entire stay must be within stayRange
    PARTIAL - any part of the stay must be within stayRange
    CHECK_IN - check-in date must be in stayRange

blackoutPolicy.description:
Specifies how blackoutRanges are applied:
    COMPLETE - entire stay must not fall in a blackoutRange
    PARTIAL - any part of the stay must not fall in a blackoutRange
    CHECK_IN - check-in date must not fall in a blackoutRange

amount.description: When calculated = PERCENT_OF_SUBTOTAL, 0.12 would equal 12% tax

unitId.description: The unit id this tax should apply to

link.description: A link to the details for the tax

message.description: Informational text in relation to status

taxId.description: The newly created tax id (when status is SUCCESS)

url.description: The relative url for getting the newly created tax (when status is SUCCESS)

isAvailableForBooking.description: true if unit should be available for distribution - use to add content before activating units

bedroomCount.description: integer greater than 0 representing total # of bedrooms

fullBathrooms.description: integer representing # of full baths (contain tub, sink, & toilet)

threeQuarterBathrooms.description: integer representing # of 3/4 baths (shower, sink & toilet)

currencyCode.description: unit's default unit of currency. Defaults to USD
